de.must.util
Class HrefHtmlLink

java.lang.Object
  de.must.util.HrefHtmlLink

public class HrefHtmlLink
extends java.lang.Object

HREF as to be found in HTML source code lines. Checks HTML statements for HREFs and provides methods to change them like making them absolute.

Constructor Summary
HrefHtmlLink()
          Consturcts a new HREF HTML link.
 
Method Summary
 java.lang.String getCurrentHref()
          Returns the currently found HREF in the line to check.
 java.lang.String makeAbsolute(java.lang.String line, java.lang.String currentPath)
          Makes the current HREF absolute.
 boolean next()
          Finds the next HREF if available in line as set by setLineToCheck.
 void setLineToCheck(java.lang.String line)
          Sets the line of the HTML source code to check and manipulate.

clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

setLineToCheck

public void setLineToCheck(java.lang.String line)
Sets the line of the HTML source code to check and manipulate.

Parameters:
line - the line of the HTML source code to check and manipulate

next

public boolean next()
Finds the next HREF if available in line as set by setLineToCheck.

Returns:
true if (another) HREF was found in line to check
See Also:
setLineToCheck(String)

getCurrentHref

public java.lang.String getCurrentHref()
Returns the currently found HREF in the line to check.

Returns:

makeAbsolute

public java.lang.String makeAbsolute(java.lang.String line,
                                     java.lang.String currentPath)
Makes the current HREF absolute.

Parameters:
line - the line of the HTML source code to be changed
currentPath - the path of the current URL to which the HREF is associated
Returns:
the line with the absolute HREF
